mapper.select: select * from EP_WORKOT_FLOW where UID = #{uid} and APPLY_NO = #{applyNo}
mapper.insert: insert into EP_WORKOT_FLOW ( UID,APPLY_NO,USER_NO,WORKOT_START_TIME,WORKOT_END_TIME,WORKOT_TYPE, TIME_SHEET,AUTH_FLOW,AUTH_STATUS,AUTH_VIEW,ATTACHM,REMARK,CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE ) value( #{uid}, #{applyNo}, #{userNo}, #{workotStartTime}, #{workotEndTime}, #{workotType}, #{timeSheet}, #{authFlow}, #{authStatus}, #{authView}, #{attachm}, #{remark}, #{createdBy}, date_format(now(),'%y-%m-%d') )
mapper.update: update EP_WORKOT_FLOW set WORKOT_START_TIME = #{workotStartTime}, WORKOT_END_TIME = #{workotEndTime}, WORKOT_TYPE = #{workotType}, TIME_SHEET = #{timeSheet}, ATTACHM = #{attachm}, REMARK = #{remark} where UID = #{uid} and APPLY_N0 = #{applyNo}
mapper.delete: delete from EP_WORKOT_FLOW where APPLY_N0 = #{applyNo} and UID = #{uid}
mapper.select: select w.APPLY_NO AS applyNo, c.ORGAN_NO AS organNo, c.DERP_NO AS deptNo, o1.ORGAN_NAME AS companyname, o2.ORGAN_NAME AS deptname, c.USER_NO AS userNo, c.CUST_NAME AS custName, w.WORKOT_TYPE AS WORKOT_TYPE, w.WORKOT_START_TIME AS WORKOT_START_TIME, w.WORKOT_END_TIME AS WORKOT_END_TIME, w.TIME_SHEET AS TIME_SHEET, w.REMARK AS remark, w.ATTACHM AS attachm, w.CREATED_BY AS createdBy, w.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate from EP_CUST_INFO c inner join IFDP_SYS_ORGAN_BASE o1 on c.ORGAN_NO = o1.ORGAN_NO inner join IFDP_SYS_ORGAN_BASE o2 on c.DERP_NO = o2.ORGAN_NO inner join EP_WORKOT_FLOW w on c.USER_NO=w.USER_NO where w.UID=#{uid} and c.USER_NO=#{userNo}
